title: Sudden loss of RF communication with basestation upon passing the lip in the entrance

content.raw:
With a single X1 or X2 robot, in any of the urban circuit practice worlds, I see a sudden RF exponent increase from 2.5 to infinity \(3.59539e\+307\) upon the robot passing the lip in the entrance. This is despite the base station still being physically visible to the robot. This differs from the tunnel circuit worlds, where base station communication was still available while the robot was near the tunnel entrance, and robots were able to report artifacts without completely exiting the tunnel.

I wanted to check if this behavior is by design?

Example:

```
[Dbg] [VisibilityRfModel.cc:80] Range: 16.4849, Exp: 2.5, TX: 20, RX: -50.4272
...
[Dbg] [VisibilityRfModel.cc:80] Range: 16.9977, Exp: 3.59539e+307, TX: 20, RX: -inf
```

‌
